headline: Allstate Announces Preferred Dividends Payable on Jan. 15, 2025
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., December 06, 2024--Allstate declared approximately $29.3 million in aggregate dividends on three series of preferred stock for the dividend period from Oct. 15, 2024, through Jan. 14, 2025. All the preferred dividends are payable in cash on Jan. 15, 2025, to stockholders of record at the close of business on Dec. 31, 2024, as follows:
